List<JBCXM__PickList__c> deleteList = [SELECT id FROM JBCXM__PickList__c WHERE JBCXM__CATEGORY__C = 'Adoption Measure Types' AND JBCXM__DISPLAYORDER__C >= 10];
delete deleteList;
List<JBCXM__PickList__c> pkList = new List<JBCXM__PickList__c>();
List<String> measureNameList = new List<String>{'Page Views', 'Page Visits', 'No of Report Run', 'Files Downloaded', 'Emails Sent Count', 'Leads', 'No of Campaigns', 'DB Size', 'Active Users'};
List<String> colorList = new List<String>{'#90f8dc', '#c3ed87', '#f57373', '#e39be3', '#9fe1f4',
                                            '#ffdea9', '#978fb7', '#88e4cb', '#59d0b0', '#45b698',
                                            '#97cb4c', '#75ad26', '#659323', '#537a1c', '#cf5c5c',
                                            '#b34d4d', '#963e3e', '#793a3a', '#5a2c2c', '#c876c8',
                                            '#a965a9', '#8d4f8d', '#783778', '#443a6b', '#31275b',
                                            '#662266', '#7fe2ff', '#4abfe2', '#33a5c7', '#6d658e',
                                            '#2e91ae', '#237e99', '#fed28b', '#fbc064', '#1e8d70',
                                            '#eca637', '#cc8f2e', '#af7c28', '#827aa3', '#19785f',
                                            '#b3e768', '#584f7c' };

Integer i = 10;
Integer j = 0;
JBCXM__PickList__c pkMeasure = null;
for(String measure : measureNameList) {
	pkMeasure = new JBCXM__PickList__c(Name = measure,
										JBCXM__ADOPTIONMEASURE__C   = TRUE,
										JBCXM__ATTRIBUTE1__C        = colorList.get(j),
										JBCXM__ATTRIBUTE4__C        = TRUE,
										JBCXM__CATEGORY__C          = 'Adoption Measure Types',
										JBCXM__DISPLAYORDER__C      = i,
										JBCXM__SYSTEMNAME__C        = measure
										);
	i++;
	j++;
	if(j == colorList.size()) {
		j= 0;
	}
	//This is to make the measure as usage indicator.
	if(measure.equalsIgnoreCase('Active Users')) {
        pkMeasure.JBCXM__IncludeInWidget__c = true;
	}
	pkList.add(pkMeasure);
}

insert pkList;
